segments.text: I see the boy stretching so far to reach the cookie jar, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is so unstable, and he’s just balancing on it like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s ever fallen before and just doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely trusting him not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task that she doesn’t even notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a slow-motion disaster about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy gets his cookie before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR
